I'm Aniket. I love to code, listen to music and I even write free-verses at times. A majority of my work is writing syntax for design.

By Aniket Pant

BarCamp Goa 2013

Community Engagement FTW

05 January 2013

The Talk

The talk delved into how brands can benefit from interacting in a better manner with their audience. It's major focus was towards how commenting systems, newsletters and events can help in engaging your users.

Quotes

Your audience gives you everything you need. They tell you. There is no director who can direct you like an audience.

Fanny Brice

Iâ€™d like every backbiter to know what, audience is always priority, rather than the stage.
